AboutPage.title: ğŸ“¦ Medicine Barcode
AboutPage.description: Medicine is a convenient app for generating barcodes. It helps quickly create, scan, and save barcodes for efficient warehouse work.
AboutPage.feature1: ğŸ§¾ Barcode generation â€” enter any text or item number and the app will automatically generate a barcode (CODE128).
AboutPage.feature2: ğŸ“· Scan barcode from photo â€” take a picture of a scanner or box with the code and the system will automatically recognize the number. The image should contain a number in the format PK/25/04/23/0813.
AboutPage.feature3: ğŸ’¾ Save results â€” all generated or scanned codes can be saved locally for quick access later.
AboutPage.feature4: ğŸ•’ Break schedule â€” in the navigation menu, you can see work and break times so you wonâ€™t forget to rest ğŸ˜„
AboutPage.step1: Go to the main page of the app.
AboutPage.step2: Enter the item number or press the camera icon to upload a photo with a barcode in the format PK/25/04/23/0813.
AboutPage.step3: Wait for the system to read the code â€” it will appear in the text field.
AboutPage.step4: Save the result to always have it at hand.
AboutPage.footer: The app also works offline and supports PWA â€” you can add it to your phone's home screen and use it like a regular app.

HowToInstallPWA.title: What is PWA?
HowToInstallPWA.description: PWA (Progressive Web App) is an app you can install directly from the website â€” no need to use Google Play or App Store.
HowToInstallPWA.tip: A PWA works like a regular app: it has its own icon, works offline, and is faster than a website in the browser.
HowToInstallPWA.androidTitle: How to install on Android ğŸ“±
HowToInstallPWA.androidStep1: Open the app in Chrome or another Chromium-based browser (e.g., Edge).
HowToInstallPWA.androidStep2: Click â‹® (three dots) in the top-right corner.
HowToInstallPWA.androidStep4: Confirm installation â€” the app will appear on your screen!
HowToInstallPWA.iosTitle: How to install on iPhone ğŸ
HowToInstallPWA.iosStep1: Open the app in Safari (important â€” only Safari supports PWA).
HowToInstallPWA.iosStep2: Click the Share icon in the bottom bar (square with arrow up).
HowToInstallPWA.iosStep3: Scroll down and choose 'Add to Home Screen'.
HowToInstallPWA.iosStep4: Give it a name and click Add.
